section.title: Page Abstract
section.para: Cinder uses the Gerrit tool to review proposed code changes. The review site is http://review.openstack.org.
Gerrit is a complete replacement for Github pull requests. All Github pull requests to the Cinder repository will be ignored.
See Gerrit Workflow Quick Reference for information about how to get started using Gerrit. See Gerrit, Jenkins and Github for more detailed documentation on how to work with Gerrit.
